Content.Text:
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi there, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you think they are doing? Shall
we ask and find out?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! Emma! Lovely, lovely to see
you both!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, Clement. Can you tell us... what
exactly is going on here?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
A test of strength!
<PAGE>
Everyone here is arm wrestling to see
who's the strongest.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that sounds like fun!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
There's a prize, too. Look over there.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
That's... an apple!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's right. It's the ultimate apple,
given to me by a good friend.
<PAGE>
So sweet, so juicy, just one bite and
you'll be hooked forever!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I-If you win, then you get to eat that
apple?
<PAGE>
Clement! I'm taking part!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Emma, are you serious? You'll be going
up against men!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love apples! Please let me try!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our next challenger, then, is Emma!
She's ready to take on our current
reigning champion, Charles!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So it looks like I'm the strongest out
of everyone here, as it stands.
<PAGE>
If you can beat me, which is a big IF, 
then that apple will be yours, Emma.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Normally I would hold back a little, but
I want my own lovely women to get a
taste of that apple!
<PAGE>
Therefore, you shall experience my true
power!

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
O-Okay! The same goes for me!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will the two participants please lock
hands!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ready... go!

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Haaaah!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
W-What!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
E-Emma wins! Emma is the winner!

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes!<RED>∀</RED> I did it, <MYNAME>! The apple is
mine!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
H-How can this be? I gave it everything
I've got and still she defeated me?

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
That was amazing! She didn't even break
a sweat!

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
She was like some sort of war god! Her
expression, her strength... no one could
have stood against her!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
She works in shipping, after all. All
that heavy lifting has made her
strong in ways we can't imagine!
<PAGE>
I'm sure today's result will go down in
the history of our town.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee hee...<RED>∀</RED> Oh, my sweet apple!
Come to me, fruity darling!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Emma, please come up and claim your
prize!
